title: NTSB: D.C. Metro Incident Highlights Need To Improve Transit Safety
teaser: The National Transportation Safety Board is investigating a subway train incident in Washington, D.C., on Monday afternoon that left one person dead and sent dozens of passengers to local hospitals. On Tuesday, the NTSB also announced its so-called "Most Wanted List" of safety fixes for this year.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
